refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Converts a real-valued input array in real-imaginary interleaved complex format, setting its imaginary parts to 0. The output array will be double the size of the input. This is a utility operation to facilitate complex-value operations on real arrays.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: kout[] -- output array containing the complex-valued real-imaginary output. It will be created if it does not exist.
kin[] -- input array containing the real-valued input.
